TopicTitle: The pool at the Adminestration facility not working???

Articles.Content:
I know this is a bit silly but i have tried to swim in the pool alot and it just acts like a useless aesthetic;.;. if there is a way you could make it actually be water my kerbals will have some summer fun

BTw using KSP .25 Windows 64-bit Steam.

It is silly and completely valid. Unfortunately I don't know if it'll change since there isn't actually "water" where the pool is. At the moment, it is just a useless aesthetic.

Cheers,

~Claw
